location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '10'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This image shows Riyam and parts of the bay in the right background.Rocky outcrops descend from left to centre of the image where several poles, perhaps telegraph poles, can be seen.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Riyam.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘b’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘10’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
